author: andrea21z
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is created to remove a module that are not used anymore in production:
`MuonErrorMatrixAdjuster` from `RecoMuon/TrackingTools`.

  - The issue is described in [#37973](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37973).
  - The deprecated module was implemented in 2007, but it was replaced in production by another module (`RecoMuon/TrackingTools/interface/MuonErrorMatrix.h`) before 2013.
  - Files related with this module have been removed.


#### PR validation:

The proposed changes passed all code format and runTheMatrix tests.
title: Remove 'MuonErrorMatrixAdjuster' module
